column1: Display_Label:Basic form 1 for Skip logic(Radio buttons only)
Display_Label:Basic form 2 for Skip logic(Combo boxes only)
Display_Label:1 Skip logic- More than 1 attribute depends on one or more radio button pvs of different sub form
NOTE~Pulse depends on blood pressure 100 110 and 120 of Basic form 1
NOTE~Source of Information depends on pulse 60 56 and 78 of Basic form 1
Display_Label:2 Skip logic- More than 1 attribute depends on one or more combo box values of different sub form
NOTE~Pulse depends on blood pressure 100 110 and 120 of Basic form 2
NOTE~Source of Information depends on pulse 60 56 and 78 of Basic form 2
Display_Label:3 Skip logic- PVs of one or more attributes depends on one or more pvs of radio button
NOTE~Pvs of Pulse depends on blood pressure 100 110 and 120 of Basic form 1
NOTE~Pvs of Source of Information depends on pulse 60 56 and 78 of Basic form 1
Display_Label:4 Skip logic- PVs of one or more attributes depends on one or more pvs of combo box
NOTE~Pvs of Pulse depends on blood pressure 100 and 120 of Basic form 2
NOTE~Pvs of Source of Information depends on pulse 60 56 and 78 of Basic form 2
Display_Label:5 Skip Logic- Default values as per Skip logic
NOTE~For Pulse=56 from Basic form 2 the default value is 1 of Basic form 2
NOTE~For Pulse=60 from Basic form 2 the default value is 2 of Basic form 2
NOTE~For Pulse=78 from Basic form 2 the default value is 3 of Basic form 2
Display_Label:6 Skip Logic- Sub form show hide depends uponpvs of another subform
NOTE~Form 6 depends upon pulse rate 60 56 and 78 of Basic form 2
subcategory:Basic form 1 for Skip logic(Radio buttons only):single
subcategory:Basic form 2 for Skip logic(Combo boxes only):single
subcategory:1 Skip logic- More than 1 attribute depends on one or more radio button pvs of different sub form:single
subcategory:2 Skip logic- More than 1 attribute depends on one or more combo box values of different sub form:single
subcategory:3 Skip logic- PVs of one or more attributes depends on one or more pvs of radio button:single
subcategory:4 Skip logic- PVs of one or more attributes depends on one or more pvs of combo box:single
subcategory:5 Skip Logic- Default values as per Skip logic:single
subcategory:6 Skip Logic- Sub form show hide depends uponpvs of another subform:single
